text: i recently had a medical procedure that was supposed to be routine but the visit was incredibly rushed and disorganized the staff didnt take the time to explain what was happening or answer my questions and i felt like they were treating me like a piece of meat instead of a person the front desk was unhelpful when i asked for information and the equipment looked like it hadnt been cleaned in decades overall the experience was a complete nightmare
seed: drink this turn to the left swallow get outnnthe visit was extremely rushed nobody made any attempt to answer questions about the procedure or what was going on or why i was getting tests done in the first place they just rushed through the entire thing i felt like nothing but a piece of meatnnthe whole experience made what should have been a routine visit for a simple procedure into an utter nightmarennthe front desk couldnt explain what was needed for the procedure without asking specific questions they got downright angry when i asked for the addressnits on rainbow is a pretty lousy answer rainbow is a long roadnnequipment looked like it hadnt been sanitized since the late 80s im pretty sure an xray machine shouldnt be covered with the yellow crust like the bottom of a toilet seat

text: if i could id give it a zerostar rating we waited in line for what felt like an eternity finally made it inside and were met with a disappointing experience the pool had more workers than customers and the bartenders seemed clueless they not only put orange juice in a premixed margarita but also ignored paying customers while standing with their backs turned to us to top it all off we were asked to leave the pool after an hour so our bags could be checked even though they had already been searched upon entry it was a frustrating and unenjoyable experience
seed: if i could i would have given it zero stars we waited in a line for a long time finally got in and there were more workers than customers no drinking within 4 feet of the pool bartenders not only didnt know how to pour a drink they put orange juice into a margarita that was premixed but also there were four of them standing with their backs to the crowd ignoring paying customers after being in the pool for an hour they asked us to get out to check our bags even though they had to look in them as we were coming in really they couldnt tell us to check our bags as we were going in but had to kill our fun it was a terrible experience

text: id love to give this place a negative star rating if i could we stood in line for what felt like forever only to be greeted by a lackluster experience the pool was overstaffed and the bartenders seemed to be incompetent they put orange juice in a margarita that was already premixed and then ignored us while we were trying to order drinks to make matters worse we were asked to leave the pool after only an hour so that our bags could be searched even though they had already been checked when we entered it was a terrible experience from start to finish

text: i appreciate that osf provides glutenfree pasta options for individuals with dietary restrictions but ive had inconsistent experiences with their inventory sometimes the server informs me that theyre out of glutenfree pasta after ive already placed my order which is frustrating recently we ordered our meals received our drinks and ate our salads before the server told me they were out of glutenfree pasta it was a disappointing experience especially since the kitchen manager was on vacation and no one placed the supply order
seed: one thing that i love about osf is that they offer glutenfree pasta for those of us who have wheatgluten issues the one thing that i hate about osf is that you never know if they will actually have the glutenfree pasta in stock usually the server will inform me upon ordering that they are out of my pasta which is aggravating but at least we can determine if we want to stay or not before actually ordering this time we placed our order received our drinks ate our dinner salads and then a full 30 minutes after we placed the order the server informed me that they were out of glutenfree pasta apparently the kitchen manager was on vacation and no one placed the supply order so not cool we just paid for our drinks and left

text: the evening began on a disappointing note as the hostesses were unable to locate my reservation however the hot rocks small plate featuring thinly sliced sirloin cooked on a heated rock somewhat made up for the initial mishap unfortunately the restaurant only provided a limited amount of meat with the hot rock which was insufficient for a hungry individual like myself the 9 oz petite filet was unremarkable to say the least if youre in the market for a steakhouse in las vegas i would not recommend this establishment mr massie and the light group will need to make improvements to turn things around
seed: the dinner started poorly as the hostesses could not find my reservation  the experience was improved somewhat by the hot rocks small plate which included thinly sliced sirloin placed upon a heated rock to cook the meat  unfortunately the restaurant only provided a minimal amount of meat with the hot rock and as a growing monkey a few slices clearly was not enough  the 9 oz petite filet was uninspired at best  if you are looking for steaks in las vegas then do not come here  mr massie and the light group will need to improve this restaurant or they will continue their slide

text: the start of the dinner was marred by the hostesses inability to find my reservation but the hot rocks small plate with its thinly sliced sirloin cooked on a heated rock somewhat redeemed the experience however the restaurants skimpy portion of meat with the hot rock left much to be desired especially for a growing monkey like myself the 9 oz petite filet was uninspired to say the least if youre looking for a steakhouse in las vegas this restaurant is not worth your time mr massie

text: ive spent a significant amount of time at various barriques locations and i must say that this particular spot has some convenient advantages its situated in a central location has spacious tables for studying and offers an endless supply of water however this place is my least favorite due to the absence of cozy leather chairs and a fireplace and the staffs inability to handle credit card transactions in fact they gave the people ahead of me a hard time for not having cash despite the fact that their computer system was at fault when it was my turn to pay the cashier struggled to process my cash payment and i ended up receiving a larger size than i had ordered to top it all off there were no apologies for the inconvenience or the extended wait
seed: i have spent a fair amount of time at the various barriques locations studying nthis location has the following virtues conveniently located downtown good size tables for studying built in water cooler so there is an endless supply of water to help yourself to as opposed to a pitcher however this is my least favorite location because of the combination of no comfy leather chairs to snuggle down into no fireplace and the staffing there was trouble with their computer system and they couldnt accept credit cards nthe people ahead of me had already ordered and their orders had been made but they had no cash the staff just gave the people a hard time about something that was caused by the coffee shops system no its our fault here have it on us just continually pushing the people about not having cash nthis was followed by me attempting to pay in cash the cashier couldnt figure out what to do had to reboot the computer system didnt put in my order and then rung up my order for a larger size than i ordered no apologies for all of this and the extended wait

text: ive had the pleasure of visiting several barriques locations and this one stands out for its convenient features located in the heart of downtown it boasts ample study spaces and a selfserve water cooler unfortunately this location doesnt quite live up to its potential due to the lack of comfortable seating and a fireplace moreover the staff encountered technical difficulties while processing credit card payments causing unnecessary stress for both them

text: i had an amazing time at the 80s nightclub on friday but i forgot that vegas allows smoking inside clubs the music was incredible with 80s hits playing all night long but the smoke from cigarettes everywhere really bothered me i had to step outside to our vip area to catch my breath and escape the smoke despite the inconvenience a cute guy asked me to dance but i wasnt feeling my best due to the smoke inhalation oh well maybe next time
seed: 80s night on fridays the idea was awesome however i forgot that this was vegas and that they allow smoking inside the club i died literallynnthe music was awesome 80s galore however the smoking left and right really did bother me to the point where i had to stop and go back to our vip area since my breathing was scarce and big people dancing with their cigarettes in their hands so not attractive nnthe only consolation a cute guy wanted to dance with me but my game was off probably because of too much smoke inhalation that i wasnt in the right frame of mind to dance the night away oh well sorry cutie but next time nnthus if you want 80s this is the place but if youre used to sf and the no smoking rule youve been warned

text: i had a blast at the 80s club on friday but i didnt anticipate the smoking inside the club the music was awesome with 80s tunes playing nonstop but the smoke from cigarettes was overwhelming i had to take a break and step outside to our vip area to get some fresh air a cute guy asked me to dance but my smokeinduced haze made it hard for me to fully enjoy the moment maybe next time ill be more prepared for the vegas smoking culture

text: this restaurant was subpar and overpriced we were convinced to order a special appetizer which turned out to be a lackluster antipasto platter with very little meat and vegetable options despite our hunger we were disappointed with the quality of the food and the high price we paid our pasta dish was cold and the sauce was congealed making it inedible the service was slow and unremarkable and we left feeling unsatisfied
seed: this restaurant is mediocre at best and way over priced  we were upsold on a special appetizer dish which was essentially an antipasto  we were assured there would be plenty of meat and veggie options  there werent  instead a few olives lots of fried calamari some cured meats and a bill for 60  not worth itnnour meals  bleh  we hadnt eaten for 10 hours before we sat down for dinner so we ate what we would normally send back one of our meals was stone cold  and it was a pasta in a rich sauce which resembled congealed pudding  it had to go back  when it came back out it wasnt much better but the sauce was not congealednnfor this meal for 3 including 2 drinks each no dessert and no salad we paid 300   it took forever to get drinks and no one filled our water without asking  the server was very friendly but that didnt help make the meal less disappointingnni am giving them 2 stars instead of 1 because they graciously accommodated us when many other restaurants were closed

text: our experience at this restaurant was underwhelming the appetizer we ordered was not worth the price and the main courses were also disappointing the pasta dish was particularly unappetizing as it was cold and the sauce was like congealed pudding the service was friendly but not attentive and it took a long time to receive our drinks overall we felt that the restaurant did not live up to our expectations and did not justify the high cost

text: i recently purchased a ham and cheese croissant from a local bakery but i had a disappointing experience with their customer service despite my initial excitement to try their product i was unable to pay with my credit card as they werent equipped to handle such a payment method when i finally received my order it was cold and lackluster as if it had been sitting in the refrigerator instead of being heated up as promised to top it off the woman at the counter didnt even say thank you while the other employee who attempted to heat up my order did show some courtesy i give them two stars for their subpar service and i hope they take customer feedback seriously to improve their business
seed: wow really  bought one item from them a ham and cheese croissant  first i couldnt pay with my credit card since they werent ready for such a strange form of payment  then they were supposedly heating my order up with their toaster oven press and when i got to my room it was as if they had taken it out of the refrigerator  too bad i didnt notice it until i was already to my room  obviously they didnt have their little heater plugged in or something  plus the woman at the counter who took my cash didnt even say thank you  the other lady who thought she was heating up my order did say thank you to me  thats the only reason theyre getting two stars and not one  you provide lousy service you get one or two stars from me on yelp  dont underestimate the power of reviews from real customers  itll decrease your businesses if you stink  thanks for reading

text: after receiving an invitation to a wedding in tempe i was excited to have a reason to stay at the valley ho hotel which had recently undergone a renovation the restoration was impressive as many of the hotels original features were preserved including the decorative precast concrete and unique staircase handrails we stayed in a king suite overlooking the pool which was a good thing since the weekend crowd at the pool was the only downside of our stay the room was great with a fantastic bathtub and toiletries by red flower being the highlights the hotel staff was friendly and attentive with the exception of a few rowdy poolgoers who acted like rockstars or pornstars on the weekends overall our stay was very enjoyable
seed: after wed been invited to a wedding in tempe i was thrilled to finally have a reason to stay at the valley ho  the hotel was renewed five years ago and the renovationrestoration is very well done  so much of the original hotel features were intact including the decorative precast concrete throughout the hotel and the cool staircase handrails  we stayed in a king suite off of the pool thank goodness because the weekend pool crowd was the only negative of our stay  the room was greatthe bathtub and toiletries by red flower being our favorite things  the hotel staff was polite and attentive  other than the weekend rockstarpornstar wannabes who took over the pool the stay was absolutely pleasant

text: we opted to venture away from the strip during presidents day weekend seeking a break from the glamour and chaos based on yelp reviews we expected this place to be amazing but the outofstate admission price during winter seemed a bit steep considering the offerings while the gardens were neglected the origins sustainability and state museums were intriguing however most exhibits catered to children making it a decent family destination if youre looking for a strip escape and have a car its not a mustsee attraction though
seed: we decided to head off the strip as we were tired of the glamor smoke and craziness on presidents day weekendnnbased on the yelp reviews we thought this place would be awesome however i would say the outofstate admission price during the winter is somewhat steep considering what you get yes it is totally nice to have a different culture outside of the lights and glam however the gardens were in disrepair we were there in mid february maybe some of the items are just doormat in the winter nnthe origins sustainability and state museums were interesting but most of the exhibits were geared towards kids nna good place to bring your family if you are in desperate need of a vacation from the strip and have a car head over here i wouldnt say it is a must see though

text: tired of the glitz and craziness of the strip on presidents day weekend we decided to explore beyond the bright lights yelp reviews led us to believe this place would be incredible but the winter admission price for outofstate visitors seemed a tad high given the experience although the gardens were in disarray the sustainability and state museums provided interesting insights most exhibits were designed with kids in mind making it a good option for families seeking a break from the strip and willing to drive its not a mustvisit attraction but worth considering

text: i had my first dining experience at this restaurant and it exceeded my expectations the quantity of food was impressive and the quality was consistent across all dishes the value was unbeatable especially considering the price the server was attentive and ensured that our drinks and plates were always full and clean the parking lot was nearly full when i left indicating a loyal customer base my favorite dishes were the orange chicken beef with broccoli and egg roll the vanilla soft serve with hersheys syrup was a delightful dessert option
seed: this is the first time i have eaten in  previously i had some else pick me up take out  at 625 for lunch it is an excellent value  at 655 for take out lunch it is even more of a value  picture mashing down on your suitcase to get the lid to close and you will have an idea of how much food you get in your take out box they actually do mound it up and then force the lid down  two hungry adults would do well to finish itnni was in a vegetable mood so i started off with salad fresh iceburg with dressing a slightly spicy cole slaw jello and a bowl of egg drop soup i had a variety of meats and vegetables on my next two trips  nothing really stood out and several items seemed overcooked although nothing was bad enough i left any on my plate  my favorites were the orange chicken beef with broccoli and the egg roll  dessert is vanilla soft serve with or without hersheys syrupnnthe place is kept clean  it wasnt too busy in the dining room but there was also a steady stream of take out customers  they kept drinks full and plates cleared pretty quick the parking lot was over 12 full when i left just before noon  this place has a steady following of customers

text: i recently tried this restaurant for the first time and it was a pleasing experience the food was plentiful and the prices were reasonable the server was friendly and accommodating ensuring that our dining experience was enjoyable the restaurant was wellmaintained and the parking lot was nearly full during my visit i would recommend this place to anyone looking for a satisfying meal at a good value my favorite dishes were the orange chicken beef with broccoli and egg roll

text: the renovation of kiva han coffee shop seems to have overlooked an important aspect of ambiance specifically the lighting while its not a big deal during the daytime or when the weather is clear the lack of adequate illumination at night makes the place look uninviting and even appears to be closed despite this i believe the decor has the potential to be really cool but i havent had the chance to fully appreciate it due to the lighting issues
seed: this is only a comment on the atmosphere they seem to have forgotten something when they remodeled kiva han coffee shop lighting which is ok if it is daytime and not overcast like tends to be the case most of the time in pittsburgh but at night if you look in the place doesnt even seem to be open i think it might actually be really cool decor but i have yet to see it

text: the service at this restaurant was satisfactory but the menu could use some additions to cater to healthconscious diners currently the menu offers very few salad options and no grilled fish specials we ordered several dishes including beer boiled shrimp cod sandwich chicken tenders fries wedge salad and bean and sausage soup while the food was good a side of vegetables or fruit would have been a welcome addition my husband also enjoyed the wednesday chicken special and were looking forward to trying the friday night fish fry we hope the restaurant will consider adding more salads and vegetables to their menu
seed: service was just fine in this family friendly restaurant ie entrees in plastic baskets condiments in paper cups etc nnthe menu would benefit greatly from a few more healthy entree options  more salads  maybe a nightly fish special that isnt deep fried  nnwe ordered the beer boiled shrimp entree the cod sandwich chicken tenders for the kids a basket of fries the wedge salad and your bean and sausage soup of the nightoh and the cheese curds because were wisconsinites  it all tasted fine but a side of veggies as an option would have been greatly appreciated  or fruit  nnmy husband stopped in for the wednesday chicken special last week and loved it  we are also looking forward to trying the friday night fish fry nnplease do add some more salads to your menu and some vegetables with the entrees  nnthanks

text: our dining experience at this familyfriendly restaurant was positive but the menu had some gaps in terms of healthy options the menu could benefit from adding more salads and a nonfried fish entree we ordered various dishes including beer boiled shrimp cod sandwich chicken tenders fries wedge salad and bean and sausage soup everything tasted good but a side of vegetables or fruit would have been a nice touch my husband also enjoyed the wednesday chicken special and were eager to try the friday night fish
seed: service was just fine in this family friendly restaurant ie entrees in plastic baskets condiments in paper cups etc nnthe menu would benefit greatly from a few more healthy entree options  more salads  maybe a nightly fish special that isnt deep fried  nnwe ordered the beer boiled shrimp entree the cod sandwich chicken tenders for the kids a basket of fries the wedge salad and your bean and sausage soup of the nightoh and the cheese curds because were wisconsinites  it all tasted fine but a side of veggies as an option would have been greatly appreciated  or fruit  nnmy husband stopped in for the wednesday chicken special last week and loved it  we are also looking forward to trying the friday night fish fry nnplease do add some more salads to your menu and some vegetables with the entrees  nnthanks

text: i have a deep affection for this establishment having visited multiple times and consistently returning due to its welcoming ambiance while the coffee offerings are comparable to those found elsewhere the unique selling point of this location is its comfortable and relaxed atmosphere the spacious room adorned with mismatched chairs and tables creates a tranquil environment perfect for leisurely gatherings although i wasnt impressed with the red velvet cupcake i tried on a previous visit the overall quality of the baked goods is satisfactory i appreciate the diversity of seating options including the outdoor patio which is somewhat marred by its proximity to a busy street the service here is variable depending on the staff member attending to my needs ranging from friendly and attentive to brusque and perfunctory
seed: i love this place ive been here a handful of times and keep coming back because of the atmosphere nncoffee is pretty much coffee everywhere ive been to several and theyre all pretty much the same thats the case here too nnbut the reason this place is great is because of the vibe its a spacious room with white walls mismatched chairs and tables nnits a good place to come and chill out its very quiet and laid back nni did have the red velvet cupcake they had once before and i wasnt a fan but it wasnt terrible nni like to meet up with one of my friends here from time to time the patio is nice but its alongside a busy street so its a little noisy nnservice depends on who is there ive gotten some people who are very friendly and nice and some who just ask you what your order is and hand it out

text: i thoroughly enjoy visiting this place having been here several times and always looking forward to coming back the coffee is on par with what id expect at any other coffee shop but its the laidback vibe that really sets it apart the large welllit space with mismatched furniture creates a cozy atmosphere thats perfect for meeting friends or just unwinding on my own while i wasn

text: i visited this place on a tuesday for lunch and it was eerily empty when we arrived we were the only customers at noon and it felt surreal i ordered a pitcher of blue moon beer and a small chicken supreme pizza which was surprisingly affordable at around 15 the pizza was delicious and the crust was perfect which is impressive since im quite particular about my crust we had a great time and got a bit tipsy hehe
seed: came here on a tuesday i believe for lunch when we walked in we were the only people in the place and it was like noon or 1 ordered a pitcher of beerblue moon and a small pizzachicken supreme and it was only like 15 bux i believe it was perfect for the both of us and got us pretty tipsy   hehe pizza was really good and so was the crust and i am picky about crust lol

text: im looking for a great place to get a haircut i prefer a simple style with short hair on top and faded sides but ive had issues with stylists rushing through the job and missing spots i recently found a barber at andys who took his time and made sure every line was perfect he even used a straight razor to finish my sideburns and nape and the whole experience was very friendly and reasonably priced i think ive found my goto barber
seed: great place to go for a haircut  i wear a very simple style short on top and faded on the sides so a lot of the time the person doing my hair just zips through the job and sometimes misses some of it  my barber at andys took his time and made sure every line was squared away he even finished my sideburns and nape with a straight razor to make sure they were extra neat  everyone there was friendly and the price was very very reasonable for the quality of service  ive found my barber

text: im in search of a topnotch barber who can deliver a fantastic haircut i keep my hair simple with a short neat style on top and faded sides but ive had problems with stylists not taking their time and leaving some areas unfinished at andys i discovered a barber who took his time and made sure every strand was perfectly aligned he paid extra attention to my sideburns and nape using a straight razor to create a crisp clean finish the atmosphere was welcoming and the price was unbeatably reasonable for the quality of service i think ive found my new barber

text: im genuinely astonished that this wax center receives negative reviews as an aesthetician i have complete faith in their waxing abilities and appreciate their dedication to providing exceptional service ive never had the chance to try their brazilian wax but im confident that its topnotch and their focus on home care is admirable the staff is consistently friendly and welcoming with the rare exception of a bad day additionally their unique wax formula is unparalleled and their efficiency and sanitation standards are impressive overall i give them five stars and highly recommend them
seed: im actually surprised this place gets bad reviews at all  i love this wax center  im an aesthetician and i trust them to my waxing needs theres no way i can do a brazillian on myselfi just cant  i also used to work in retail so i understand the upselling aspect it doesnt bug me  especially because they know home care is just as important as your service and they care  ive always found them to be friendly and welcoming theres always the occasional exception which i just chalk up to a bad day super efficient sanitary hello nail shops who double dip  and they have theyre own trademarked wax which is  by far the best ive ever experienced  ive never had my brows done there but you honestly have to find someone who is good at shaping browsjust because you can wax doesnt mean you can shape  and like the previous review said  yes you have to be very specific  no one is a mind reader so be helpful to your techniciannso anyway 5 stars i love them

text: im really surprised that this wax center gets bad reviews as someone who works in the aesthetics industry i know how important it is to have a good waxing experience and this place delivers their staff is always friendly and welcoming and they have their own trademarked wax that is handsdown the best ive ever used while ive never had my brows done there i think its important to find a technician who is skilled at shaping brows as not everyone who can wax can also shape them properly that being said i
seed: im actually surprised this place gets bad reviews at all  i love this wax center  im an aesthetician and i trust them to my waxing needs theres no way i can do a brazillian on myselfi just cant  i also used to work in retail so i understand the upselling aspect it doesnt bug me  especially because they know home care is just as important as your service and they care  ive always found them to be friendly and welcoming theres always the occasional exception which i just chalk up to a bad day super efficient sanitary hello nail shops who double dip  and they have theyre own trademarked wax which is  by far the best ive ever experienced  ive never had my brows done there but you honestly have to find someone who is good at shaping browsjust because you can wax doesnt mean you can shape  and like the previous review said  yes you have to be very specific  no one is a mind reader so be helpful to your techniciannso anyway 5 stars i love them

text: i have a treasured family heirloom  an engagement ring thats been passed down for generations  and i wanted to keep the tradition alive by giving it to my fiancé however two other jewelers told me that the ring was beyond repair due to a crack in the setting and that i should consider using the stone in a new setting thankfully i found cg who not only restored the ring to its former glory but also did it in just four days i cant recommend them enough and id advise anyone in the area to ignore the negative reviews and give them a try
seed: cg was recommended to me by some family friends i have an engagement ring that has been in my family for almost 150 years and i wanted to keep the tradition alive by giving the ring to my fiance i visited two other jewelers who both told me that they could not size the ring up that it had an irreparable crack in the setting and that i would be best suited to scrap the ring and use the stone in another setting i went to c  g with the notion that i was going to have to do just that however c  g told me that was not the case at all and in four days had restored the ring and it looks like it is brand new i can not thank them enough and would urge anyone reading yelp to ignore the two bad reviews found here i would strongly urge anyone in central phoenix who needs a good high quality highly skilled jeweler to seek out c  g

text: i was hesitant to take my familys antique engagement ring to just anyone for sizing especially after two other jewelers told me it was irreparable but cg proved to be the exception they not only fixed the crack in the setting but also returned the ring to me in pristine condition within four days their expertise and customer service are second to none and i highly recommend them to anyone in the central phoenix area
